page.title: 07Farming
page.content: Ty Mawr farm is a form of experiment to judge if farming and large scale industry can live in harmony together.The farm is situated next to the Anglesy Aluminium processing plant.The farm is mainly a dairy unit with a herd of a 120 pure bred Canadian holstein cattle. The farm has a herringbone milking parlour wher 10 cattle can be milked at the same time.The milk is taken by lorry to the local creamery which is 15 kilometres away.The feeding required to over winter the cows is grown on the farm and kept in the silage tower.The stock are tested periodically to see if there are any side effects from the factory.
